findings.title: Insecure Token Usage by Design
findings.description: Token usage is insecure by design and should only be used for testing purposes.

findings.title: No issues related to the data immutability were found
findings.description: Auditors manually reviewed the implementation of bundles, events and assets validation; compared implementation logic against available documentation.

findings.title: Serialization to Store JSON or Calculate Hash
findings.description: The system uses serialization to store JSON data in the database or calculate a hash of the data using JSON.stringify and JSON.parse for json serialization and deserialization.

findings.title: No issues were discovered during manual test of the system
findings.description: Manual testing of the system did not reveal any security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Permissions are correctly implemented
findings.description: All actions that require verification limit access as expected.
